options.label: Get product details by slug (getProductDetailBySlug)
options.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product using its unique slug identifier. This includes product name, description, images, variants, and other metadata.

options.label: Retrieve products (getProducts)
options.description: Get a list of products from your catalog with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination. Useful for displaying product listings and search results.

options.label: Get product sizes by slug (getProductSizesBySlug)
options.description: Fetch available sizes for a specific product using its slug. This includes size information, stock availability, and size-specific pricing.

options.label: Retrieve user's followed listings (getFollowedListing)
options.description: Get a list of products that the user has marked as favorites or followed. Useful for implementing wishlist functionality.

options.label: Unfollow an item by ID (unfollowById)
options.description: Remove a product from user's followed/favorite items list using the product's unique identifier.

options.label: Follow an item by ID (followById)
options.description: Add a product to user's followed/favorite items list using the product's unique identifier.

options.label: Retrieve product price by slug (getProductPriceBySlug)
options.description: Get detailed pricing information for a specific product using its slug. Includes current price, discounts, and any applicable price variations.
